title: FTX Founder Sam Bankman-Fried Should Get Up to 50 Years in Prison, $11 Billion Fine: DOJ
description: The U.S. Department of Justice set out its sentencing recommendations Friday after FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried was found guilty last year.

title: DeFi TVL breaches $100B, MakerDAO readies DAI ‘Endgame:’ Finance Redefined
description:
The total value locked in DeFi protocols has breached $110 billion — but it’s still short of the $189 billion all-time high recorded in November 2021.

Welcome to Finance Redefined, your weekly dose of essential decentralized finance (DeFi) insights — a newsletter crafted to bring you the most significant developments from the past week.

The DeFi ecosystem continues to see bullish price action as its total value locked (TVL) breached $100 billion for the first time in over two years, MakerDAO is gearing up for its stablecoin “Endgame” scalability transformation, Ethena becomes the highest-earning decentralized app (DApp), and DeFi platform Unizen will reimburse its users after suffering a multimillion-dollar hack.

In other news, BNB Chain has announced its new rollup-as-a-service solution for layer-2 networks.

Read more

title: Exploiters drain $2 million from Mozaic Finance
description: Mozaic Finance experiences a major security breach, leading to a $2 million loss.

title: Ethereum Rollups Start Reaping Dencun Benefits: 99% Fee Drops Reported in Some Cases
description: Ethereum rollups, the layer 2 scaling structures, have started reaping the benefits of the recently applied Dencun upgrade. The update, which included EIP-4844, also known as Proto-Danksharding, has allowed transaction fees to decrease by 99% in some cases, with Arbitrum, Base, Optimism, and Starknet becoming cheaper across the board. Ethereum Dencun Upgrade Reduced Rollup Fees […]

title: Worldcoin and Render surge, Rebel Satoshi launches $RECQ presale
description: Worldcoin and Render see significant gains amid the crypto market's rally, while Rebel Satoshi's $RECQ presale promises substantial returns. #partnercontent

title: Floki surges with major token burn, NuggetRush eyes gaming, BNB’s bullish forecast
description: Floki's price jumps after burning 14.5 billion tokens; NuggetRush targets the billion-dollar gaming market; Binance Coin may hit new highs. #partnercontent

title: Uniswap Research finds Layer 2’s are cheaper to swap on than Ethereum
description: A study by Austin Adams from Uniswap Labs revealed that transactions and liquidity provisions on layer-2 networks offer lower cost advantages over Ethereum's mainnet.

title: DOJ: Sam Bankman-Fried merits a 40-to-50-year sentence
description: Prosecutors asked a U.S. District Judge to jail Sam Bankman-Fried for 40-50 years following his conviction last November.

title: Borroe Finance presale launches as Fetch.ai and Render gain traction
description: Borroe Finance announces presale with significant early investor returns as Fetch.ai and Render experience market surges amid key developments. #partnercontent
